entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
